Methods : The foot joint ( talocrural , talocalcaneal , talonavicular , naviculocuneiform , calcaneocuboid , 5th tarsometatarsal 1st 5th metatarsophalangeal [ MTP ] joint ) 50 healthy subject 50 patient RA ( asymptomatic foot ) evaluate bilaterally regard quantitative/semi-quantitative synovitis , semi-quantitative Power Doppler ( PD ) signal erosion use ultrasound .
